column4: so how is ubuntu so customizable? are there things on the installed version u cant see on the live cd?
everything on the panels can be moved/removed/modified, and it's much easier to re-theme Ubuntu than it is XP, for example
oh, i figured that out in like 5 minutes of messing around with it. I thought there were like things you could modify that made certain things run differently i guess
you can, it just depends on which things you want to modify...
